casebody.data:
SNIPES
v.
BRITTHAVEN, INC., et al. 332P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 7, 2016 Scott Lewis, Attorney at Law, Pamela Renee Lawrence, Wilmington, for Britthaven, Inc., et al. Gary K. Shipman, Attorney at Law, Kyle J. Nutt, Attorney at Law, Wilmington, for Snipes, Sandra D. et al. Joseph Williford, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for McQueen, Fred (Jr.)(M.D.)

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th of September 2016 by Defendants (Britthaven, Inc., Principle Long Term Care, Inc. and Spruce LTC Group, LLC d/b/a Richmond Pines Healthcare and Rehabilitation Center) for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of September 2016."
